sqlMap.select:
select * from (select a.*, row_number() over(order by a.kh_id) rn, count(*) over() totalCount from ( select distinct a.kh_id,a.kh_name,a.provinces,a.city,a.region,a.kh_addr,a.kh_card,a.kh_phone1,a.kh_phone2,a.introduce_name, (case when b.ht_id is not null then 1 else 0 end ) is_ws from kq_kh_info a LEFT JOIN kq_ht_info b on a.kh_id = b.kh_id where a.is_valid =1
and a.kh_name like '%$kh_name$%'
and charindex(a.region,#org_ids#) >0
and exists (select * from kq_ht_info b where a.kh_id=b.kh_id and b.is_valid=1)
and not exists (select * from kq_ht_info b where a.kh_id=b.kh_id and b.is_valid=1)
and introduce_name = #introduce_name#
and kh_phone1 = #kh_phone1#
and kh_phone2 = #kh_phone2#
and a.kh_addr like '%$kh_addr$%'
) a) t where t.rn>(#page_num#-1)*#page_size# and #page_num#*#page_size# >= t.rn

select * from (select a.*, row_number() over(order by a.kh_id) rn, count(*) over() totalCount from ( select distinct a.kh_id,a.kh_name,a.provinces,a.city,a.region,a.kh_addr,a.kh_card,a.kh_phone1,a.kh_phone2,a.introduce_name from kq_kh_info a where is_valid =1
and a.kh_name like '%$kh_name$%'
and charindex(a.region,#org_ids#) >0
and introduce_name = #introduce_name#
) a) t
select seq_value from kq_seq_kh_id where region_id = #region_id#
sqlMap.update: update kq_seq_kh_id set seq_value = seq_value+1 where region_id = #region_id#
sqlMap.select: select seq_value from kq_seq_ht_id
select seq_value from kq_seq_hf_id
sqlMap.insert:
insert into kq_kh_info ( kh_id, kh_name, provinces, city, region, kh_phone1, kh_phone2, kh_addr, kh_card, introduce_name, create_id, create_date, is_valid
) values ( #kh_id#, #kh_name#, #provinces#, #city#, #region#, #kh_phone1#, #kh_phone2#, #kh_addr#, #kh_card#, #introduce_name#, #create_id#, getdate(), 1 )
sqlMap.select:
select * from (select a.*, row_number() over(order by a.kh_id) rn, count(*) over() totalCount from ( select distinct a.kh_id,a.kh_name,a.provinces,a.city,a.region, a.kh_addr,a.kh_card,a.kh_phone1,a.kh_phone2,a.introduce_name, a.is_install,a.channel_source,a.remark from kq_yxkh_info a where is_valid =1
and a.kh_name like '%$kh_name$%'
and charindex(a.region,#org_ids#) >0
and introduce_name like '%$introduce_name$%'
and kh_phone1 = #kh_phone1#
and kh_phone2 = #kh_phone2#
and a.kh_addr like '%$kh_addr$%'
and a.is_install = #is_install#
and a.channel_source like '%$channel_source$%'
) a) t where t.rn>(#page_num#-1)*#page_size# and #page_num#*#page_size# >= t.rn

select distinct a.kh_id,a.kh_name,a.provinces,a.city,a.region, a.kh_addr,a.kh_card,a.kh_phone1,a.kh_phone2,a.introduce_name, a.is_install,a.channel_source,a.remark from kq_yxkh_info a where is_valid =1
and a.kh_name like '%$kh_name$%'
and charindex(a.region,#org_ids#) >0
and a.introduce_name like '%$introduce_name$%'
and a.kh_phone1 = #kh_phone1#
and a.kh_phone2 = #kh_phone2#
and a.kh_addr like '%$kh_addr$%'
and a.is_install = #is_install#
and a.channel_source like '%$channel_source$%'
sqlMap.insert:
insert into kq_yxkh_info ( kh_id, kh_name, provinces, city, region, kh_phone1, kh_phone2, kh_addr, kh_card, introduce_name, channel_source, is_install, remark, create_id, create_date, is_valid
) values ( #kh_id#, #kh_name#, #provinces#, #city#, #region#, #kh_phone1#, #kh_phone2#, #kh_addr#, #kh_card#, #introduce_name#, #channel_source#, #is_install#, #remark#, #create_id#, getdate(), 1 )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE kq_kh_info set is_valid=0,change_id = #operator_id#,change_date = getDate() where is_valid =1 and kh_id = #kh_id#
UPDATE kq_yxkh_info set is_valid=0,change_id = #operator_id#,change_date = getDate() where is_valid =1 and kh_id = #kh_id#

UPDATE kq_yxkh_info set kh_phone1 = #kh_phone1#, kh_phone2 = #kh_phone2#, kh_addr = #kh_addr#, kh_card = #kh_card#, introduce_name = #introduce_name#, channel_source = #channel_source#, is_install = #is_install#, remark = #remark#, change_id = #create_id#, change_date = getdate() where is_valid =1 and kh_id = #kh_id#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into kq_kh_info ( kh_id, kh_name, provinces, city, region, kh_phone1, kh_phone2, kh_addr, kh_card, introduce_name, create_id, create_date, is_valid
) select kh_id, kh_name, provinces, city, region, kh_phone1, kh_phone2, kh_addr, kh_card, introduce_name, create_id, create_date, is_valid from kq_yxkh_info where kh_id = #kh_id#
sqlMap.select: select a.kh_id, a.kh_name, (select value_name from kq_dict_cfg where is_valid = 1 and dict_id = 1010 and value = a.provinces) provinces, (select value_name from kq_dict_cfg where is_valid = 1 and dict_id = 1011 and value = a.city) city, (select value_name from kq_dict_cfg where is_valid = 1 and dict_id = 1012 and value = a.region) region, a.kh_addr, a.kh_card, a.kh_phone1, a.kh_phone2, a.introduce_name, a.channel_source, a.is_install, a.remark from kq_yxkh_info a where a.is_valid =1 and a.kh_id = #kh_id#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE kq_kh_info set kh_name=#kh_name#, provinces=#provinces#, city=#city#, region=#region#, kh_phone1=#kh_phone1#, kh_phone2=#kh_phone2#, kh_addr=#kh_addr#, kh_card=#kh_card#, introduce_name=#introduce_name#, change_id=#create_id#, change_date=getdate() where is_valid =1 and kh_id = #kh_id#
sqlMap.select:
select * from (select a.*, row_number() over(order by a.ht_date_current) rn, count(*) over() totalCount from ( select distinct a.kh_addr,a.kh_id,a.kh_name,a.kh_card,a.kh_phone1,a.kh_phone2,a.introduce_name, b.ht_id,b.ht_date_first,b.ht_date_current,b.ht_pledge,b.ht_rent,b.prod_name,b.prod_code,b.ht_year,b.remark ,b.ht_type from kq_kh_info a ,kq_ht_info b where a.kh_id = b.kh_id and b.is_valid =1 and a.is_valid =1
and charindex(a.region,#org_ids#) >0
and a.kh_id = #kh_id#
and a.kh_name like '%$kh_name$%'
and b.ht_date_current >= #ht_begin_date#
and #ht_end_date# >= b.ht_date_current
) a) t where t.rn>(#page_num#-1)*#page_size# and #page_num#*#page_size# >= t.rn

select distinct a.kh_id,a.kh_name,a.kh_addr,a.kh_phone1,a.kh_phone2,b.ht_date_first,b.ht_date_current from kq_kh_info a ,kq_ht_info b where a.is_valid =1 and b.is_valid=1 and exists (select * from kq_kh_info c where c.kh_id=#kh_id# and a.kh_name+'+'+a.kh_phone1 = c.introduce_name) and a.kh_id = b.kh_id order by b.ht_date_first desc

select distinct a.kh_id,a.kh_name,a.kh_addr,a.kh_phone1,a.kh_phone2,b.ht_date_first from kq_kh_info a ,kq_ht_info b where a.is_valid =1 and b.is_valid=1 and a.kh_id = b.kh_id and a.introduce_name = (select distinct t.kh_id from kq_ht_info t where t.is_valid =1 and t.ht_id = #ht_id# ) order by b.ht_date_first desc
sqlMap.insert:
insert into kq_ht_info ( kh_id, ht_id, ht_code, ht_date_first, ht_date_current, ht_pledge, ht_rent, ht_type, prod_name, prod_code, ht_year, remark, create_id, create_date, is_valid
) values ( #kh_id#, #ht_id#, #ht_code#, #ht_date_first#, #ht_date_current#, #ht_pledge#, #ht_rent#, (case when #ht_date_first#=#ht_date_current# then 1 else 2 end), #prod_name#, #prod_code#, #ht_year#, #remark#, #create_id#, getdate(), 1 )

insert into kq_hf_info ( ht_id, hf_id, hf_date_must, hf_type, hf_status, is_valid ) values ( #ht_id#,#hf_id1#,CONVERT(varchar(12) , dateadd(MONTH,3,#ht_date_current#), 23 ),1,0,1), ( #ht_id#,#hf_id2#,CONVERT(varchar(12) , dateadd(MONTH,6,#ht_date_current#), 23 ),2,0,1), ( #ht_id#,#hf_id3#,CONVERT(varchar(12) , dateadd(MONTH,9,#ht_date_current#), 23 ),3,0,1), ( #ht_id#,#hf_id4#,CONVERT(varchar(12) , dateadd(MONTH,12,#ht_date_current#), 23 ),4,0,1)
sqlMap.update: update kq_ht_info set ht_code=#ht_code#, ht_date_first=#ht_date_first#, ht_date_current=#ht_date_current#, ht_pledge=#ht_pledge#, ht_rent=#ht_rent#, prod_name=#prod_name#, prod_code=#prod_code#, ht_year=#ht_year#, remark=#remark#, change_id=#create_id#, change_date=getdate() where is_valid=1 and ht_id=#ht_id#
UPDATE kq_ht_info set is_valid=0 where is_valid =1 and ht_id=#ht_id#
UPDATE kq_hf_info set is_valid=0 where is_valid =1 and ht_id=#ht_id#
sqlMap.select:
select * from (select a.*, row_number() over(order by a.ht_date_current) rn, count(*) over() totalCount from ( select distinct a.kh_addr,a.kh_id,a.kh_name,a.kh_card,a.kh_phone1,a.kh_phone2,a.introduce_name, b.ht_id,b.ht_date_first,b.ht_date_current,b.ht_pledge,b.ht_rent,b.prod_name,b.prod_code,b.ht_year,b.remark,b.ht_type from kq_kh_info a ,kq_ht_info b where a.kh_id = b.kh_id and b.is_valid =1 and a.is_valid =1
and charindex(a.region,#org_ids#) >0
and a.kh_name like '%$kh_name$%'
and b.ht_type = #ht_type#
and b.ht_date_current >= #ht_begin_date#
and #ht_end_date# >= b.ht_date_current
) a) t where t.rn>(#page_num#-1)*#page_size# and #page_num#*#page_size# >= t.rn

select * from (select a.*, row_number() over(order by a.ht_date_current) rn, count(*) over() totalCount from ( select distinct a.kh_addr,a.kh_id,a.kh_name,a.kh_card,a.kh_phone1,a.kh_phone2,a.introduce_name, b.ht_id,b.ht_date_first,b.ht_date_current,b.ht_pledge,b.ht_rent,b.prod_name,b.prod_code,b.ht_year,b.remark from kq_kh_info a ,kq_ht_info b where a.kh_id = b.kh_id and b.is_valid =1 and a.is_valid =1
and charindex(a.region,#org_ids#) >0
and a.kh_name like '%$kh_name$%'
and b.ht_date_current >= #ht_begin_date#
and #ht_end_date# >= b.ht_date_current
) a) t

with cte_child(org_id,parent_org_id,org_name,data_level ) as ( select org_id ,parent_org_id,org_name,data_level from kq_region_relation where ( org_id = (select case when org_level=3 then region when org_level=2 then city else provinces end from kq_user_region where sno =#sno#)
) union all select a.org_id ,a.parent_org_id,a.org_name,a.data_level from kq_region_relation a, cte_child b where a.parent_org_id=b.org_id ) select * from cte_child where data_level = 4 order by data_level,org_id

select * from (select a.*, row_number() over(order by a.kh_id,a.hf_date_must) rn, count(*) over() totalCount from ( select distinct a.ht_id,hf_id,hf_date_must,hf_date_fact,hf_status,hf_user_name,hf_remark,hf_type, ht_date_current,ht_year,b.ht_pledge,b.ht_rent,b.kh_id,kh_name,kh_phone1,kh_addr,kh_phone2,kh_card from kq_hf_info a ,kq_ht_info b,kq_kh_info c where a.ht_id = b.ht_id and b.kh_id = c.kh_id and a.is_valid=1 and b.is_valid=1
and charindex(c.region,#org_ids#) >0
and c.kh_name like '%$kh_name$%'
and a.hf_status = #hf_status#
and a.hf_type = #hf_type#
and a.hf_date_must >= #hf_begin_date#
and #hf_end_date# >= a.hf_date_must
) a) t where t.rn>(#page_num#-1)*#page_size# and #page_num#*#page_size# >= t.rn

select * from (select a.*, row_number() over(order by a.kh_id,a.hf_date_must) rn, count(*) over() totalCount from ( select distinct a.ht_id,hf_id,hf_date_must,hf_date_fact,hf_status,hf_user_name,hf_remark,hf_type, ht_date_current,ht_year,b.ht_pledge,b.ht_rent,b.kh_id,kh_name,kh_phone1,kh_addr,kh_phone2,kh_card from kq_hf_info a ,kq_ht_info b,kq_kh_info c where a.ht_id = b.ht_id and b.kh_id = c.kh_id and a.is_valid=1 and b.is_valid=1
and charindex(c.region,#org_ids#) >0
and c.kh_name like '%$kh_name$%'
and a.hf_status = #hf_status#
and a.hf_type = #hf_type#
and a.hf_date_must >= #hf_begin_date#
and #hf_end_date# >= a.hf_date_must
) a) t
select a.ht_id,a.hf_id,a.hf_date_must,a.hf_date_fact,a.hf_status,a.hf_user_name,hf_type,a.hf_remark from kq_hf_info a where a.is_valid=1 and hf_id = #hf_id#

select distinct c.ht_id,c.hf_date_fact,c.hf_date_must,c.hf_remark,c.hf_status,c.hf_type,c.hf_user_name from kq_kh_info a ,kq_ht_info b,kq_hf_info c where a.kh_id=b.kh_id and b.ht_id=c.ht_id and a.is_valid=1 and b.is_valid=1 and c.is_valid=1 and a.kh_id = #kh_id# order by c.ht_id,c.hf_type
sqlMap.update:
update kq_hf_info set hf_date_fact=#hf_date_fact#, hf_remark=#hf_remark#, hf_user_name=#hf_user_name# ,
materail1 = 1,
materail2 = 1,
materail3 = 1,
materail4 = 1,
hf_status=1 where hf_id=#hf_id# and is_valid=1
update kq_hf_info set hf_date_fact=#hf_date_fact1#, hf_remark=#hf_remark1#, hf_user_name=#hf_user_name1# , hf_status=1 where hf_id=#hf_id1# and ht_id=#ht_id# and is_valid=1
update kq_hf_info set hf_date_fact=#hf_date_fact2#, hf_remark=#hf_remark2#, hf_user_name=#hf_user_name2# , hf_status=1 where hf_id=#hf_id2# and ht_id=#ht_id# and is_valid=1
update kq_hf_info set hf_date_fact=#hf_date_fact3#, hf_remark=#hf_remark3#, hf_user_name=#hf_user_name3# , hf_status=1 where hf_id=#hf_id3# and ht_id=#ht_id# and is_valid=1
update kq_hf_info set hf_date_fact=#hf_date_fact4#, hf_remark=#hf_remark4#, hf_user_name=#hf_user_name4# , hf_status=1 where hf_id=#hf_id4# and ht_id=#ht_id# and is_valid=1
